title: Royal College of Art
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822204413/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Education](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822204413/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Education) : Royal College of Art**

Originally founded in 1837 as a school of industrial design, the **Royal College of Art** (RCA), London, specialises in postgraduate studies of art and design.

Their website is: [http://www.rca.ac.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822204413/http:/www.rca.ac.uk/)
author: higashi
